summary: A woman unhappy in her passionless marriage leaves her husband for a younger and more ardent lover.
cast: Vivien Leigh|Kenneth More|Eric Portman|Emlyn Williams|Moira Lister|Arthur Hill|Dandy Nichols|Jimmy Hanley|Miriam Karlin|Heather Thatcher|Bill Shine|Brian Oulton|Sidney James|Alec McCowen|Gibb McLaughlin|Raymond Francis|Mandy Harper
title: The Deep Blue Sea
